body: You can put powerful creatures to sleep with the power of your song.
name: The Lullaby of Ember the Ancient
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Bard/Masterpieces/The Lullaby of Ember the Ancient

sections.body: When you activate this soothing performance, one target within close range falls asleep as if affected by deep slumber as long as you maintain the performance. Unlike the spell (which affects weaker creatures first), this masterpiece targets a specific creature of your choice. Although this lullaby does have words, it is not a language-dependent effect.
sections.name: Effect

sections.body: 1 bardic performance round per round.
sections.name: Use
